verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your love, Your love has saved my soul
You’re the One, the One, who leads me home
Your love, Your love has saved my
You’re the One, the One, who lives inside of me
(Whoa oh whoa oh, everlasting love
Come guide me on, come shine above)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Heavens are rejoicing You are good, You are good
Here on the earth, we sing take Your place
So that every heart’s responding Jesus You, You are true
We’re praying let Your kingdom come (we wanna see Your light shine!)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My cup is overflowing bursting forth all around
Let Your mercy flourish, let Your name resound
Waiting for the promise of Your plans fulfilled
Let Your glory shine in us (we wanna be Your light Lord)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bursting forth to glorious day
Lift my hands and come to pray
Who oh oh whoa come shine above
Send Your Spirit come what may
In all we do and all we say
Who oh oh whoa come shine above
